price: “Yoo sobdoota taataniif adabbiin isaa maal ta’a?” jedhaniin.
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
